variants.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Study Guide: Associate SAA-C03 Exam
variants.author: Ben Piper & David Clinton
variants.description: The most comprehensive study guide for the SAA-C03 exam. Covers all exam objectives with hands-on labs and practice questions.

variants.title: The Kubernetes Book
variants.author: Nigel Poulton
variants.description: The fastest way to get your head around Kubernetes. Perfect for architects building cloud-native container orchestration.

variants.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
variants.author: Martin Kleppmann
variants.description: The definitive guide to building reliable, scalable, and maintainable systems. Essential reading for any cloud architect.

variants.title: The Phoenix Project
variants.author: Gene Kim, Kevin Behr & George Spafford
variants.description: A novel about IT, DevOps, and helping your business win. Understand the cultural and organizational aspects of cloud transformation.

variants.title: Cloud Native Patterns
variants.author: Cornelia Davis
variants.description: Design patterns for building resilient, scalable cloud-native applications. Learn microservices, containers, and serverless patterns.

variants.title: Terraform: Up & Running
variants.author: Yevgeniy Brikman
variants.description: Write infrastructure as code using Terraform. Essential for any cloud architect working with multi-cloud or AWS deployments.

variants.title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
variants.author: Robert C. Martin
variants.description: The classic guide to writing clean, maintainable code. Essential principles for any software professional.

variants.title: The DevOps Handbook
variants.author: Gene Kim, Jez Humble, Patrick Debois & John Willis
variants.description: How to create world-class agility, reliability, and security in technology organizations. The companion to The Phoenix Project.
